author: Detroit Free Press
title: Our Michigan Valentine's Day cards will have you laughing
text:

A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Our Michigan Valentine's Day cards will have you laughing Brian Manzullo , Detroit Free Press 11:14 a.m. ET Feb. 14, 2017 Buy Photo A Michigan Valentine's Day meme for 2017. (Photo: Ryan Garza, Detroit Free Press) Buy Photo 252 CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
We're feeling the love this Valentine's Day. 
In honor of that, we came up with some uniquely Michigan Valentine's Day memes for our social channels (which you should be following if you aren't already). 
Follow us on: Facebook | Twitter | Instagram 
Enjoy!
